short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful set of SEO tools by Nafis Iqbal. To boost your SEO productivity with robots.txt, sitemap, schema validator, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Toolkit - Your All-in-One SEO Assistant

The SEO Toolkit Chrome extension is a comprehensive tool designed to enhance your SEO productivity by offering essential technical SEO checks in just a few clicks. Whether you're an SEO expert or a website owner, this extension simplifies complex SEO tasks and helps you maintain a search engine-friendly website.

##Key Features:

1. Robots.txt Checker: Quickly locate the website’s robots.txt file to review crawling and indexing rules set for search engines.

2. Sitemap Checker: Easily find the website's XML sitemap to ensure it’s structured properly and accessible to search engines.

3. Site Domain Search: Perform a thorough domain search to retrieve key SEO metrics and domain information.

4. Schema Validator: Validate structured data (schema) to make sure it complies with SEO best practices and enhances search engine visibility.

5. Site Speed Checker: Analyze the loading speed of your website to ensure optimal performance and user experience.

6. All URLs on a Page: Get a comprehensive list of all URLs found on the page, making link audits fast and easy.
